title: Web Development
description: Learn modern web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks

title: Design
description: Master UI/UX design principles and tools like Figma

title: Data Science
description: Explore data analysis, machine learning, and AI fundamentals

title: Mobile Development
description: Build native and cross-platform mobile applications

title: Introduction to React
description: Learn what React is, why it's popular, and how it differs from vanilla JavaScript.

children.text: Welcome to React! In this lesson, we'll explore the fundamentals of React.

title: Components and Props
description: Deep dive into React components - the building blocks of any React application.

children.text: Components are the heart of React.

title: State and Lifecycle
description: Master React state management with useState hook.

children.text: State is what makes React components interactive.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive
description: Explore all the built-in React hooks.

children.text: Hooks let you hook into React state and lifecycle features.

title: Introduction to Next.js
description: Discover Next.js, the React framework for production.

children.text: Next.js is a React framework for building web applications.

title: App Router and Navigation
description: Master Next.js 14+ App Router.

children.text: The App Router is built on React Server Components.

title: Figma Interface Overview
description: Learn the Figma interface and essential tools.

children.text: Figma is a powerful design tool for creating user interfaces.

title: Components and Variants
description: Create reusable design components with variants.

children.text: Components help you create consistent, scalable designs.

title: Interactive Prototyping
description: Build interactive prototypes to test your designs.

children.text: Prototyping brings your designs to life.

title: UX Design Principles
description: Learn the fundamental principles of user experience design.

children.text: Good UX design puts users first.

title: User Research Methods
description: Discover methods for understanding your users.

children.text: User research helps you make informed design decisions.

title: Python Fundamentals
description: Learn Python programming basics for data science.

children.text: Python is the most popular language for data science.

title: Data Analysis with Pandas
description: Master data manipulation with the Pandas library.

children.text: Pandas makes data analysis easy and intuitive.

title: Data Visualization
description: Create stunning visualizations with Matplotlib and Seaborn.

children.text: Visualization helps communicate insights from data.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Understand the fundamentals of machine learning.

children.text: Machine learning enables computers to learn from data.

title: Supervised Learning
description: Learn classification and regression algorithms.

children.text: Supervised learning uses labeled data to make predictions.

title: React Native Setup
description: Set up your React Native development environment.

children.text: Get started with React Native development.

title: React Native Components
description: Learn the core React Native components.

children.text: React Native provides native components for mobile apps.

title: Navigation in React Native
description: Implement navigation patterns in your mobile app.

children.text: Navigation is crucial for mobile app UX.

title: Introduction to Flutter
description: Get started with Flutter and Dart.

children.text: Flutter enables beautiful, natively compiled applications.

title: Flutter Widgets
description: Master Flutter's widget system.

children.text: Everything in Flutter is a widget.

title: React Fundamentals
description: Master the core concepts of React

title: Advanced React
description: Level up with advanced React patterns

title: Next.js Essentials
description: Learn the fundamentals of Next.js

title: Figma Essentials
description: Master Figma for UI design

title: UX Fundamentals
description: Learn user experience design principles

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python for data analysis

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Introduction to machine learning

title: React Native Basics
description: Build mobile apps with React Native

title: Flutter Basics
description: Get started with Flutter

title: React Masterclass
description: The complete guide to React development. Start from the basics and progress to advanced patterns. Perfect for developers who want to master React.

title: Next.js: The Complete Guide
description: Master Next.js 14+ and build modern, full-stack React applications. Learn the App Router, Server Components, and deployment.

title: Figma Mastery
description: Become a Figma expert. Learn to create beautiful, consistent designs with components, auto-layout, and interactive prototypes.

title: UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of user experience design. Conduct user research, create personas, and design user-centered products.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python for data analysis and visualization. Master Pandas, NumPy, and create stunning visualizations with Matplotlib.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms. Learn supervised learning, classification, regression, and model evaluation.

title: React Native: Mobile Apps
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications with React Native. Learn components, navigation, and native features.

title: Flutter: Complete Guide
description: Master Flutter and Dart to build beautiful, natively compiled mobile applications for iOS and Android.
